None.Name: Metal Spikes
None.Description: Activate to erupt a line of sharp metal spikes from the ground that deal several times damage to all enemies they strike. Each eruption of spikes deals 216 damage to all enemies they strike, up to 325 in total. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Gifted Root
None.Description: Enter this mode to become immobile and link the unit to a friendly root network. While connected Sun Reaver charges up his powers: if he is linked to the network for at least 10 seconds he will start to regenerate 45 life points every second for 15 seconds. As he is not able to generate any support for the network himself he needs to link into a network that already has members other than Sun Reaver units.

None.Name: Burning Paws
None.Description: Enemies hit by the Sun Reavers' glowing paws will be set on fire and take additional damage but steadily increases the longer they burn.
